testcase.name: stock_trades_api_medium should create a new trade of buy type
testcase.classname: should create a new trade of buy type

failure.message: expected { trade: { id: 1, type: 'buy', …(5) } } to deeply equal { type: 'buy', user_id: 23, …(4) }

testcase.name: stock_trades_api_medium should create a new trade of sell type
testcase.classname: should create a new trade of sell type

failure.message: expected { Object (trade) } to deeply equal { type: 'sell', user_id: 23, …(4) }

testcase.name: stock_trades_api_medium should fetch all the trades

failure.message: expected { trades: [ …(4) ] } to deeply equal [ { trade: { id: 1, …(6) } }, …(3) ]

testcase.failure:
AssertionError: expected { trades: [ …(4) ] } to deeply equal [ { trade: { id: 1, …(6) } }, …(3) ] at Context.<anonymous> (test\index.spec.js:86:30) at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5)
+ expected - actual: failed to generate Mocha diff
